author: gstein
msg: Add some code for the work queue processing, as an indicator of where I'd
like to go with this. Also see 'wc-ng-design' for requirements on any work
items that are registered with the work queue.
(svn_wc__wq_run): run any items that are in the work queue.
(svn_wc__wq_add_revert): add a "revert" work item into the queue.
(struct work_item_dispatch): a simple structure to build a dispatch
table for work items to handler functions.
(run_revert): a handler function for the "revert" work item. not yet
(dispatch_table[]): a table to map work item names to handlers.
(svn_wc__wq_run): new function to process the work queue
(svn_wc__wq_revert): unimplemented function to add a revert work item

author: arfrever
msg: Fix Issue 3413: Bindings fail to load FS modules with enabled run-time module
Fix undefined references to svn_fs_path_change2_create() revealed by running

author: arfrever
msg: When SVN_DEBUG is defined, print error messages containing details about
failures of dynamic loading of libraries performed by apr_dso_load().

author: arfrever
msg: Run .py tests in alphabetic order instead of random order.

author: gstein
msg: Rename the param in svn_io_remove_file2() to IGNORE_ENOENT for consistency
